page.title: 06COMMUNICATIONS.
page.content: In our area we have one Post Office.It is quite near to the Hare and Greyhound.The Post Office has confectioners counter where sweets are sold and there is a bank.It is only a small bank and there aren't many people in it.There are stamps for sale and there is a post box in an outside wall.The Post Office is also used for withdrawing pensions on Thursdays.Just recently our Post Office has swapped over with John and Dorothy {Hopper.Mrs.Haigh and Mrs.Ozbaldesdon deliver the post to people that live in Bowburn.The Post Office is over the road from the Industrial Estate.The road is the A177 that leads into Durham.
